alert.note: Alert for Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 18 at 9:44AM EST until November 20 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow possible. Total snow accumulations in excess of 8 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northern Erie and Southern Erie counties. * WHEN...From Saturday evening through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy snow moves onshore from the lake overnight Saturday night into early Sunday. Blowing and drifting snow along with high snowfall rates may make travel hazardous across northeast Ohio.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
